comments: 13208*a(n) is the number of permutations of (n+1) symbols that 9-commute with an (n+1)-cycle (see A233440 for definition), where 13208=A000757(9). - _Luis Manuel Rivera Mart√≠nez_, Feb 06 2014
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 8..1000
formula: Number of 11-subsequences of [ 1, n ] with just 1 contiguous pair; g.f. (9+x)*x^8/(1-x)^11.
author: Thi Ngoc Dinh (via _R. K. Guy_)
